meanings.sent1: After the party, I need to reclean the dishes.
meanings.sent2: I always reclean my room before guests come over.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled flour everywhere, so I had to reclean the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter recleaned the gloomy atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The rain recleaned the dusty streets, leaving them sparkling.

meanings.sent1: Please reclean the windows to remove the streaks.
meanings.sent2: I will reclean the car to get rid of all the dirt.
meanings.sent3: He had to reclean the whiteboard after his dog ran into it.
meanings.sent4: Her apology recleaned the tension between them.
meanings.sent5: The fresh coat of paint recleaned the old fence, making it look new.

meanings.sent1: I need to reclean the kitchen after cooking a big meal.
meanings.sent2: She decided to reclean the carpet to remove the stains.
meanings.sent3: The robot vacuum recleaned the entire house while we were out.
meanings.sent4: His smile recleaned the doubts in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The strong wind recleaned the fallen leaves from the yard.
